name: Outro
_source: speak;;You completed the map in 18 or less turns! You got the full reward!;;;hint
speak;;Unfortunately, you completed the map in more than 18 turns, so your reward will be reduced accordingly.;;;hint
speak;Marisa;*phew* I'm hoping this place has a bathhouse or something.
speak;Reimu;It would be nice to get out of this cold.
speak;Lunasa;I thought guests can't invite guests.|Or that guests can't invite themselves.
speak;Marisa;Hasn't stopped anybody here, that's for sure.
speak;Lunasa;Why do you all want to go to Hakugyokurou anyway?
speak;Marisa;You see all these crazy folk?|We're gonna conscript the mistress!
speak;Marisa;Well, you three are part of the "we" now.
speak;Mima;Hey now, why don't we speed up the banter.|We're reaaaly close right now.
speak;Reimu;Wait... how do you know we are close?
speak;Lunasa;Hey, I thought I said we weren-
speak;Mima;Oh, forbid a wandering spirit from wandering now~.
speak;Marisa;Now let's get going!|Sooner we get there, the sooner we can warm up!
speak;Lunasa;*Sigh* Why did we take this deal?
